name: RivoSig International, LLC
tag_list: ecigarette, e-cig, e-cig-electronic-cigarette, e-cigarette, e-liquid, e-cigarette-liquid, atomizers, cartomizers, vaping, smoking, smoking-2-0, electronic-cigarette-liquid, electronic-cigarette-flavors
overview:
RivoSig is the premier brand of electronic cigarettes. RivoSig holds the highest level of quality for our e-cigs and offers a stylish, premium e-cigarette line.

RivoSig® also is the manufacturer of RivoSig® Platinum Series vaping products. RivoSig® Platinum is the elite line of e-liquid vaping products. We also offer customization of these products with no limitations. Our Rivo-R and Rivo-X can come standard, or we can uniquely craft an electronic cigarette of your own. Everything from custom engraving and monograms, to the epitome of customization with the use of gemstones and precious metals. The only limit is your imagination.

Supporting a healthier change to electronic cigarettes promotes the well being of the RivoSig® user and the environment in which they live. With the littering of traditional cigarette butts and the fire risks associated with “analog” cigarette waste disposal, we are committed to seeing the environmental repercussions diminish with the growth of vaping methods. We also have a cartomizer recycling program so that the empty cartomizers have value and are not just discarded in the same manner that cigarette filters are.

We are also devoted to the welfare of the electronic cigarette user and have research and independent studies conducted to refine and reduce any health risks associated with electronic smoking.

RivoSig® is an active member and contributor of: The American Cancer Society, The American Lung Association & The American Forests Conservation Society.
